basics.name: Taery
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer / Fullstack Developer
basics.summary: Data scientist and fullstack developer with experience in Flutter, Python, C++, and Rust. Passionate about building AI-powered applications, publishing open-source projects, and creating impactful developer tools.

courses: Fullstack App Development with Flutter & FastAPI

projects.name: CatLLM (Cat Can Talk)
projects.description: A Flutter + FastAPI based chatbot app that transforms text into 'cat-style' responses. Integrated with OpenAI GPT models and LangChain backend.
highlights: Implemented custom text transformations and dynamic chat bubble UI
Deployed on AWS EC2 with secure API gateway

projects.name: Collatz Conjecture Dataset
projects.description: Generated and published a massive Collatz sequence dataset (~110GB raw â†’ ~7GB Parquet compressed).
highlights: Published on Hugging Face with 370+ downloads
Optimized computation using Rust, C++, and GPU acceleration

projects.name: VS Code Sketchbook Theme
projects.description: A custom VS Code theme with Orbit fonts and unique color palettes.

projects.name: d3letters
projects.description: A Flutter application framework for building text-driven apps with a focus on customization and clean UI design.
highlights: Built a reusable app skeleton using Flutter frontend and FastAPI backend
Implemented modular design so users can easily replace or customize text content
Focused on UI consistency, typography, and theming for a polished presentation
Open-sourced the project to encourage collaboration and showcase personal branding

projects.name: poe chatbot
projects.description: Two philosopher chatbots available on the Poe platform
